name: Ava AI
description: Ava is the first AI Agent to be built on HoloworldAI. $AVA was initially launched by the community after Holoworld welcomed to the world, AVA the Holo AI intern. Since then, it has grown tremendously into a vibrant community. As Holoworld progresses, @AVA_holo will be the primary AI agent IP for showcasing Holoworlds latest developments. From on-chain experiments to unreleased AI agent features, they will lean on Ava to demonstrate our vision and gather feedback from our community.
